# Module Assessments

Make sure you've gone through all the content for modules 2.

The assessment for this module is a project for which you'll be using Github, R, RStudio and Rmarkdown to post a short personal introduction of yourself. 

A detailed description and instructions is provided as [Introducing OUrselves](./Introducing_Ourselves.html) in the _Projects_ section.
